channel.title: Circle Of Grief
channel.description:
I know that warez are not allowed here, but this is an emergency ;). I was looking throug the music I had on my pc and came across a song, that sounded great. It didn't say wich band it was, but it did say that the song was called sword of wisdom and it was from an album called into the battle. But the version I have is only 1:20 minutes long. First I searched for the band, wich was Circle Of Grief. But because it's only a short version, I went looking for the complete song or even the whole album. But neither on Torrentspy or albumbase it's available. So I tought, maby someone here on the forums has a link for me or has the song on his/her computer. If so, can you either PM me the link or if you have the song PM aswell so whe can discuss a way to send the song. Or just post here :P
Thanks in advance.

item.title: Circle Of Grief
item.dc:creator: @dragonus18 dragonus18
item.description:
@dragonus18 wrote:

R.I.P RSC:

All the files are around 115kb. Those that are bigger are called something like Schwarznegger_gets_pranked. I’d buy the cd but it’s not for sale here.

anyhting that says prank or something like that are viruses

Read full topic

item.title: Circle Of Grief
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

R.I.P RSC:

Yea I have, but it just gives loads of files that probably are viruses/adware.

Or are in fact the song you are looking for. If it’s 3000kb - 8000kb and wma/mp3 format its not a virus.
